text: When Camila Cabello had to sit out of Taylor Swift ’ s show on Tuesday due to dehydration, the star sent her scheduled opener a super - sized “ get well. ” Cabello told Twitter fans on Monday that she would have to sit out her upcoming performance. “ The doctors have told me I really have to get rest otherwise I won ’ t get better – so unfortunately I won ’ t be able to perform my set during the Reputation tour in Seattle tomorrow. I ’ m so sorry to let you guys down and I promise I will make it up as soon as I can! ” the singer shared. Evidently upset to miss out on the show, Swift gave Cabello a heartfelt shout - out. ` ` My tour mate and friend Camila Cabello meant to
